title: “All that pizzazz.” (Debate recap special!)
description: Jon, Jon, Tommy, and Dan break down a week of pizzazz-filled impeachment hearings and the fifth Democratic primary debate in Atlanta, Georgia.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
